body:
Very, very, very belated followup on this: I'm tying up loose ends in 
my thesis, and this is the last paper I want to cite I haven't actually 
seen. The history is thus:


I wrote:
> Anyone know where I can get a copy of Grynberg's Radiance Validation
> report (LBID 1575)?  I'd like to cite it and I can't seem to find it
> online anywhere.


Greg replied:
> I don't think this report exists online, and only a few copies
> exist.  I have one in my closet.


Then Steven Selkowitz:
> I'm checking to see if we have a copy on file-otherwise we can scan
> Greg's and make it available


I did follow up with LBL's archivists, and they couldn't find it.


Did it by any chance turn up?


Randolph
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2010-February/006523.html).</sup>
